name: Rhubarb Angel Dessert
author: SUNKIST2
summary: This is always a hit on our 'Snack Mom Friday' at work. Perfect summertime recipe to use up rhubarb and delicious too!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine 1 cup flour and sugar in a bowl
Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Press crust into an ungreased 8-inch square baking pan
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 15 to 20 minutes
Remove from oven, leaving heat on
Combine sugar, 2 tablespoons flour, and salt in a bowl
Beat in egg yolks and heavy cream
Pour over the hot crust in the baking pan
Return pan to the hot oven and bake 40 minutes
Beat egg whites and vanilla extract together in a bowl at medium speed until soft peaks form
Gradually add sugar and beat meringue until stiff peaks form
Remove pan from the oven, leaving heat on
Spread meringue over hot filling in the baking pan, spreading to seal edges
Return pan to the hot oven and bake 15 minutes more
